TEXT_LINE(30,12)=" used for a CDROM  release. TEXT_LINE(87,12)=" To get your  group name in the  charts as an accepted  release group, then you":COL_LINE(87,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(87,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(87,12)="0" 
TEXT_LINE(88,12)=" have to release, minium three scene points  rated releases, during the group's":COL_LINE(88,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(88,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(88,12)="0" 
TEXT_LINE(89,12)=" existence. Three 0.0 point releases does not count. TEXT_LINE(90,12)=" group  will stay/get  their releases rated in  the INDependent  section, until":COL_LINE(90,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(90,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(90,12)="0" 
TEXT_LINE(91,12)=" they have three scene point rated  releases. TEXT_LINE(92,12)=" to be 'only' represented in the INDependent section, will  of course get their":COL_LINE(92,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(92,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(92,12)="0" 
TEXT_LINE(93,12)=" request furfilled.":COL_LINE(93,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(93,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(93,12)="0"

TEXT_LINE(97,12)=" A cracked game release : 8.0 points":COL_LINE(97,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(97,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(97,12)="0" 
TEXT_LINE(98,12)=" -----------------------------------":COL_LINE(98,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(98,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(98,12)="0" 
TEXT_LINE(99,12)="":COL_LINE(99,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(99,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(99,12)="0" 
TEXT_LINE(100,12)=" Consists of an copy-protected game,  with  additional  directory,  with  copy-":COL_LINE(100,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(100,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(100,12)="0" 
TEXT_LINE(101,12)=" protection  cracked  content. The  copy-protection  cracked content has  to be":COL_LINE(101,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(101,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(101,12)="0" 
TEXT_LINE(102,12)=" included within the game iso and  not as  an addon file. If  the game  needs a":COL_LINE(102,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(102,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(102,12)="0" 
TEXT_LINE(103,12)=" key/serial to run/install, then it have to be included to be a valid release.":COL_LINE(103,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(103,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(103,12)="0" 
TEXT_LINE(104,12)="":COL_LINE(104,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(104,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(104,12)="0" 
TEXT_LINE(105,12)=" Additional rules concerning DVD rips":COL_LINE(105,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(105,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(105,12)="0" 
TEXT_LINE(106,12)=" ------------------------------------":COL_LINE(106,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(106,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(106,12)="0" 
TEXT_LINE(107,12)="":COL_LINE(107,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(107,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(107,12)="0" 
TEXT_LINE(108,12)=" They're allowed and will be rated full points if it's your own  work. DVD rips":COL_LINE(108,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(108,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(108,12)="0" 
TEXT_LINE(109,12)=" of the  same  game by  two  different groups, has  to be 1 cd lesser, than the":COL_LINE(109,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(109,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(109,12)="0"

TEXT_LINE(219,12)=" gameplay, for giving you  unlimited lives, energy, bullets  and so on. TEXT_LINE(220,12)=" the  trainer menu options has  to have an  option  that can  be turned on/off,":COL_LINE(220,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(220,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(220,12)="0" 
TEXT_LINE(221,12)=" either when you  play the  game or before you start it. 1 option in a trainer,":COL_LINE(221,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(221,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(221,12)="0" 
TEXT_LINE(222,12)=" can be Unlimited Money  on/off, which  isn't 2  options as some trainer makers":COL_LINE(222,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(222,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(222,12)="0" 
TEXT_LINE(223,12)=" seem  to think,  basicially it's  just 1 option, just turned on or off. Simple":COL_LINE(223,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(223,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(223,12)="0" 
TEXT_LINE(224,12)=" as that. ":COL_LINE(224,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(224,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(224,12)="0" 
TEXT_LINE(225,12)="":COL_LINE(225,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(225,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(225,12)="0" 
TEXT_LINE(226,12)=" The trainer have  a GUI interface  for easy  use and require good  programming":COL_LINE(226,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(226,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(226,12)="0" 
TEXT_LINE(227,12)=" knowledge to do. TEXT_LINE(229,12)=" and hear.":COL_LINE(229,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(229,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(229,12)="0"

TEXT_LINE(232,12)="":COL_LINE(232,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":FONT_LINE(232,12)="11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111":PAGE_LINE(232,12)="0"
